name: Finger Jets
description:
Finger Jets: Phase Challenge is a 2D Arcade physics game where you control the Jets of your Spaceship with your Finger tips as you Challenge 3 phases with 6 levels each.

Play the levels casually, or in a challenge mode Time Attack where you can rank yourself on the all-time leaderboards.

Dodge and burn your way past various obstacles as you collect coins and land on the landing pads.

Little bit of a throw back to lunar lander, but mostly a unique concept.

Game supports controller input, keyboard, mouse or touch. There are only 2 inputs so use what you like.
